slides.content: ag-Grid is designed to be performant with large amounts of data. To stress-test the demo, select '100,000 rows' from the Data dropdown
ag-Grid allows the end-user to group the data by specific columns. To group the data, drag the 'Country' column header to the row group area.
highlightSelector: #myGrid > div > div.ag-root-wrapper-body > div.ag-root.ag-font-style > div.ag-header > div.ag-header-viewport > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div.ag-cell-label-container.ag-header-cell-sorted-none > div

slides.content: Alternatively, you can group by dragging a column from the tool panel to the tool panel row group area.
highlightSelector: #myGrid > div > div.ag-root-wrapper-body > div.ag-tool-panel > div.ag-column-panel > div.ag-column-panel-center > div.ag-column-select-panel > div.ag-column-container > div:nth-child(4) > span.ag-column-drag

#myGrid > div > div.ag-root-wrapper-body > div.ag-tool-panel > div.ag-column-panel > div.ag-column-panel-center > div.ag-column-drop.ag-font-style.ag-column-drop-vertical.ag-column-drop-row-group > span

slides.content: Once grouped, you can display aggregation values for given column. To aggregate a given column, drag a column to the aggregation area.
highlightSelector: #myGrid > div > div.ag-root-wrapper-body > div.ag-tool-panel > div.ag-column-panel > div.ag-column-panel-center > div.ag-column-select-panel > div.ag-column-container > div:nth-child(15) > span.ag-column-drag
#myGrid > div > div.ag-root-wrapper-body > div.ag-tool-panel > div.ag-column-panel > div.ag-column-panel-center > div.ag-column-drop.ag-font-style.ag-column-drop-vertical.ag-column-drop-values > span

slides.content: You can also select value aggregation function for a given column from the column menu (visible on mouse over)
